DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the efficacy and safety of AK106-001616 in patients with rheumatoid arthritis.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of AK106-001616 in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA)
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of RA (class I to III) Stable dose of methotrexate (at least 12 weeks) Pregnant or breastfeeding Abnormal screening laboratory test values considered to be clinically significant
